description: black velvet: front is tiger face in relief, 7 metal figurines, row of small metallic ball halves, 2 horns with feathers on top, pompons and embroidery; on each side of the hat: medallion with embroidery (floral motif); two buttons and a loop; on the back: 2 decorative round elements, one with 4 petals and 2 pompons; at the top: open and puckered; pink, green, yellow, red, mauve, white; lining is printed fabric (cotton)
medium: Cotton, silk, wool, feathers, metallic thread, metal
title: Hat
